titles.title: Andrew Thomas McCaffrey Green Star Veterans Service Act
Andrew Thomas McCaffrey Green Star Veterans Service Act
To amend title 36, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a flag for next of kin of veterans who die by suicide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Andrew Thomas McCaffrey Green Star Veterans Service Act
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to design and designate the Green Star Service Flag to identify next of kin of veterans who died of suicide on or after September 11, 2001. An individual who is next of kin of such a veteran may display the flag.
